boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultAttackWithVar.NAME: Special Strike
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultAttackWithVar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !boblovespihonkaimod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultSecondMagicNu.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
boblovespihonkaimod:DefaultSecondMagicNu.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !boblovespihonkaimod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

boblovespihonkaimod:meteorKata.NAME: Meteor Kata
boblovespihonkaimod:meteorKata.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Has a 25% chance to Stun when the enemy is attacking when dealing unblocked damage.

boblovespihonkaimod:whiteComet.NAME: White Comet
boblovespihonkaimod:whiteComet.DESCRIPTION: Equip the White Comet Battlesuit. Gain !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai.

boblovespihonkaimod:nekoStomp.NAME: Neko Stomp
boblovespihonkaimod:nekoStomp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the first card played this turn, deal !boblovespihonkaimod:nekoStompD! damage instead.

boblovespihonkaimod:antimatterRounds.NAME: Antimatter Rounds
boblovespihonkaimod:antimatterRounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! additional damage against shields. If this attack breaks a shield, stun the enemy.

boblovespihonkaimod:cometWard.NAME: Comet Ward
boblovespihonkaimod:cometWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This turn, common attacks apply Weak. Exhaust.

boblovespihonkaimod:subspaceLance.NAME: Subspace Lance
boblovespihonkaimod:subspaceLance.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage !boblovespihonkaimod:SecondMagic! times. Deals additional damage equal to half your boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai. Shuffle a Void into your draw pile.

boblovespihonkaimod:honkaiEnergy.NAME: Honkai Energy
boblovespihonkaimod:honkaiEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. When drawn, gain !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai.

boblovespihonkaimod:subspacePocket.NAME: Subspace Pocket
boblovespihonkaimod:subspacePocket.DESCRIPTION: Draw !boblovepsihonkaimod:Draw! cards. Exhaust !M! cards. Exhaust. NL somekeyword 10.

boblovespihonkaimod:voidDrifter.NAME: Void Drifter
boblovespihonkaimod:voidDrifter.DESCRIPTION: Equip the Void Drifter Battlesuit. Gain !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai.

boblovespihonkaimod:shockResonance.NAME: Shock Resonance
boblovespihonkaimod:shockResonance.DESCRIPTION: Stunning enemies applies 1 Vulnerable to them.

boblovespihonkaimod:gunstorm.NAME: Gunstorm
boblovespihonkaimod:gunstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to all enemies. Requires 5 boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai to play.

boblovespihonkaimod:voidFlechette.NAME: Void Flechette
boblovespihonkaimod:voidFlechette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Costs 0 if you have 12 or more boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai.

boblovespihonkaimod:phaseShuttle.NAME: Phase Shuttle
boblovespihonkaimod:phaseShuttle.DESCRIPTION: Draw !boblovespihonkaimod:Draw! cards. Gain !M! energy. Add !boblovespihonkaimod:SecondMagic! Voids to your discard pile. Exhaust.

boblovespihonkaimod:souliumReactor.NAME: Soulium Reactor
boblovespihonkaimod:souliumReactor.DESCRIPTION: Everytime you gain boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

boblovespihonkaimod:honkaiLance.NAME: Honkai Lance
boblovespihonkaimod:honkaiLance.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. Requires !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai to play. Exhaust.

boblovespihonkaimod:zeroPointEnergy.NAME: Zero Point Energy
boblovespihonkaimod:zeroPointEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Void, exhaust the Void and add a Honkai Lance to your hand.
boblovespihonkaimod:zeroPointEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a Void, exhaust the Void and add a Honkai Lance to your hand.

boblovespihonkaimod:cptSymmetry.NAME: Charge Parity Time Symmetry
boblovespihonkaimod:cptSymmetry.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, draw !M! card from your discard pile.
boblovespihonkaimod:cptSymmetry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, draw !M! card from your discard pile.

boblovespihonkaimod:gyrodriveKata.NAME: Gyrodrive Kata
boblovespihonkaimod:gyrodriveKata.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. Increase the number of times you deal damage to that enemy by 1 for two turns.

boblovespihonkaimod:gungnirFire.NAME: Gungnir Fire
boblovespihonkaimod:gungnirFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Burning. Add 2 Burns to your discard pile.

boblovespihonkaimod:railgun.NAME: The Seven Thunders of Retribution
boblovespihonkaimod:railgun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Requires !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Honkai to play. Exhaust.

boblovespihonkaimod:starFlame.NAME: Star Flame
boblovespihonkaimod:starFlame.DESCRIPTION: Your first attack each turn applies !M! boblovespihonkaimod:Burning.
